title: Thalawathugoda Eco friendly Land
details:
30 Perches Prime Land for Sale in Thalawathugoda, Hokandara
Highly Residential area. .
600 from Vidyala junction.
Land facing the Natural Water stream.
Well secured convenient location in the Colombo city.
ideal for Eco friendly House, Villa, meditation center, Bungalow or other..

1 km to two Highway exits ( Kottawa and Athurugiriya)
It is only 20 minutes drive to the Colombo city center from this location & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs.
Ideal for both residential and business purposes in view of it’s prime location and the ever increasing value of land in the area, with all urban facilities.
